subject: Basketball (College)
Prostitution
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Louisville announced Friday that Coach Rick Pitino would skip next week’s Atlantic Coast Conference media session on the advice of lawyers because of allegations by the escort Katina Powell that the former Cardinals staffer Andre McGee hired dancers for sex parties.
